dialog.confirmation:
Are you sure you want
to end your current game?
All progress will be lost.

zumaguy.level1: Well done little frog! Keep hoppin' along!
zumaguy.level2: Right-click to switch your ball to the color on your back!
zumaguy.level3: Rejoice, tiny tadpole. Your destiny is grand majestic!
zumaguy.level4: Mighty frog plays lots to earn XP for bigger skills and Powers!
zumaguy.level5: Blast Score Multiplier balls for rich points and scores.
zumaguy.level6: Furious frogs explode Time Balls to add scoring seconds to game!
zumaguy.level7: As your powers grow and fatten, your scores will do the same!
zumaguy.level8: Frog gets big Powers in the Temple below!
zumaguy.level9: Unlock new Powers by getting higher Levels!
zumaguy.level10: Time-conscious Frog! You desire more Zuma? Click to try Zuma's Revenge for free!
zumaguy.level11: Quick shooting brings Hot Frog to unleash devastation!
zumaguy.level12: Make matches without mistake to build Chain Bonus!
zumaguy.level13: Shoot through gaps, frog! Smaller gaps for bigger points!
zumaguy.level14: Same-color balls snap gaps shut. If they match three, that's combo!
zumaguy.level15: Smash balls back to start for Curve Clear points!
zumaguy.level16: Each fruit scores more than the one before!
zumaguy.level17: Hit Treasure Chests like Fruit for points and spin!
zumaguy.level18: Every smashed ball earns Mojo! Mojo is power!
zumaguy.level19: Use Idols to buy Mojo or unlock Powers!
zumaguy.level20: Zuma Blitz, while mighty, is not all. Click to try other Zuma games for free!
zumaguy.level21: Crush your friends to earn medals! Ha!
zumaguy.level22: Click leaderboard for juicy tidbits about friends' scores!
zumaguy.level23: Different Powers are not the same! Try new ones and see!
zumaguy.level24: Speed Bonus begins to build after fast matches!
zumaguy.level25: Match fast to summon Hot Frog to blast three fireballs!
zumaguy.level26: Chain bonus starts small but gets bigger with each good match!
zumaguy.level27: Gap shots are good for points and make awesome sounds!
zumaguy.level28: Frog, set up combos of same-color balls for major scoring!
zumaguy.level29: Ha! Lots of Curve Clear bonuses make huge points bigger!
zumaguy.level30: Ha! Zuma's Revenge has other game modes to play. Click to try for free now!
zumaguy.level31: Earn Mojo by playing, or buy lots from the Store!
zumaguy.level32: Fruit shots are hard but so tasty and full of points!
zumaguy.level33: Look! The Store is open for buying things of use!
zumaguy.level34: Get bigger scores than your friends, then taunt them!
zumaguy.level36: Same-color balls snap gaps shut. If they match three, that's combo!
zumaguy.level37: Kill curve completely for large Curve Clear bonus!
zumaguy.level38: Yum! Fruit gets more points each time you pick it!
zumaguy.level39: Get Mojo and other stuff from Treasure Chest spins!
zumaguy.level40: Yearn to play Zuma in hi-def and full screen? Click to try Zuma's Revenge for free!
zumaguy.level41: Buy Idols from the store to get Idols for things!
zumaguy.level42: Check the Store for useful items, Frog!
zumaguy.level43: Keep playing to beat your friends and earn weekly medals!
zumaguy.level44: Ho ho! The leaderboard has lots of info about scores!
zumaguy.level45: Smash balls back to start for Curve Clear points!
zumaguy.level46: Frog, set up combos of same-color balls for major scoring!
zumaguy.level47: Fruit shots are hard but so tasty and full of points!
zumaguy.level48: Earn Mojo by playing, or buy lots from the Store!
zumaguy.level49: Gap shots are good for points and make awesome sounds!
zumaguy.level50: Click leaderboard for juicy tidbits about friends' scores!
zumaguy.level51: Match fast to summon Hot Frog to blast three fireballs!
zumaguy.level52: Chain Bonus starts small but gets bigger with each good match!
zumaguy.level53: Gap shots are good for points and make awesome sounds!
zumaguy.level54: Frog, set up combos of same-color balls for major scoring!
zumaguy.level55: Ha! Lots of Curve Clear bonuses make huge points bigger!
zumaguy.level56: Treasure Chests spin to win after your game, Frog!
zumaguy.level57: Earn Mojo by playing, or buy lots from the Store!
zumaguy.level58: Get Idols by leveling up or from Treasure Chests!
zumaguy.level59: Look! The Store is open for buying things of use!
zumaguy.level60: Get bigger scores than your friends, then taunt them!
zumaguy.level62: Same-color balls snap gaps shut. If they match three, that's combo!
zumaguy.level63: Kill curve completely for large Curve Clear bonus!
zumaguy.level64: Yum! Fruit gets more yummy each time you pick it!
zumaguy.level65: Get Mojo and other stuff from Treasure Chest spins!
zumaguy.level66: Every smashed ball earns Mojo! Mojo is power!
zumaguy.level67: Buy Idols from the store to get Idols for things!
zumaguy.level68: Check the Store for useful items, Frog!
zumaguy.level69: Keep playing to beat your friends and earn weekly medals!
zumaguy.level70: Ho ho! The leaderboard has lots of info about scores!

tooltips.multiplier: Each Multiplier Ball collected increases your total score multiplier
tooltips.gems_none: You need to reach Level [LEVEL] to earn Mojo
tooltips.xp:
You earned [XP] XP
[NEXTXP] more for your next Level
tooltips.gap: Earn bonus points for shooting through holes in the line
tooltips.combo: Earn bonus points by making multiple matches with one shot
tooltips.chain: Earn bonus points by making 6 or more consecutive matches
tooltips.fruit: Each Fruit earned is worth more points
tooltips.speed: Earn bonus points by making matches quickly

preloader.message:
I'm not going to lie;
I totally love this game.
You may not like flies, but trust me, they're good!

potions.mouseoverblank: Buy potions to earn triple Mojo and double XP - that means more Powers and Levels faster!
potions.mouseoverxp: DOUBLES the amount of XP you earn for the next 24 hours
potions.mouseoverxpgames: DOUBLES the amount of XP you earn for the next [GAMES] games
potions.mouseovermojo: TRIPLES the amount of Mojo you earn for the next 24 hours
potions.mouseovermojogames: TRIPLES the amount of Mojo you earn for the next [GAMES] games

out_of_sync.session_mismatch:
There's a newer game open elsewhere. Click OK to refresh
and get your latest game data.
out_of_sync.tournament_mismatch:
A new tournament has started.
Click OK to refresh and
play the new board.

insufficient_funds.body: You do not have enough Idols to make this purchase.

confirmation.body:
You are about to purchase
[ITEM]
[IDOLS] Idols will be deducted from your balance.
Do you wish to continue?

dialogs.armpowerups_insufficientfunds:
You do not have enough Mojo left to arm your Powers.
Would you like to BUY more Mojo or PLAY without Powers?
dialogs.no_lives_left:
You have no lives left!
Do you want to buy more lives or wait it out?
dialogs.grant_life_regen:
You have no lives left!
But we like you, so here's a refill!
dialogs.temple_unlock:
Temple Reached, you have gained access to the Temple and its Powers.
Your first Power is ready.
Select the Bomb to experience its blast.
dialogs.equip_bomb:
Your new Bomb Power will use [COST] Mojo each game it is active.
You can unselect a Power by clicking on it in the Temple.

tooltips.temple: Click here to open the Temple, where you can swap out your Powers or buy new ones!
tooltips.mojo: This is Mojo. It fuels your Powers. Play to earn Mojo or buy it in the Store.
tooltips.idols: These are Idols. Spend Idols on Mojo, Life, Potion or unlocking new Powers!
tooltips.store: The Store is where you can buy Mojo, Life or Potions.
tooltips.menu: Change your game options such as sound and mode.
tooltips.xp_max: You are now Golden Frog! It's time to dominate your leaderboard with this fully armed battle frog!
tooltips.invite: Invite your friends to join your Zuma Blitz tribe!

tournament_wrapup.headline: Last Week's Results
tournament_wrapup.gloat_gold: You came in 1st and won a Gold Medal!
tournament_wrapup.gloat_silver: You came in 2nd and won a Silver Medal!
tournament_wrapup.gloat_bronze: You came in 3rd and won a Bronze Medal!
tournament_wrapup.gloat_no_medal: Place in the top 3 to win a medal!

grant_flip.body:
It appears as if you have run out of hearts. Perhaps I can help?
Flip the coin for a chance at free life.

deny_flip.body: You have no Hearts left. They'll come back soon enough, but that's not soon enough!

deal.info: Visit the Store to get more Hearts.

win_flip.body:
A Full Life Refill has been granted.
Continue on your way, wise frog.
I am sure our paths will cross again in the future.

lose_flip.body: You have no Hearts left. You'll get another one if you can wait out the clock.

deal.info: Buy a Life Refill for [PRICE] Idols (40% off!).

gifts.nogift: Well done little frog! Keep hoppin' along!
gifts.life: Share a Full Life Refill with your friends!

level_desc.level: Is true, you still just a Whelp. No get all sad tho! Soon get bigger. Then laugh at others.
No take long at all, hey? New Tribeling gets new stuff for more ball-bashing! Soon get even more!
Carving kudos is fun, yes? Maybe not. No worry, you moving up, and maybe get kudos yourself!
What's this about Temples? Tribe has one and it needs sweeping! Get Temple good and ready!
Hah! Fruit is great! Go look for Fruit! Tribe is always wanting Fruit!
Somebody gotta watch big tribe sundial for lunchtime. You do it now! Blast balls for better job soon!
Tribe need somebody to keep track of tribe treasures! Put them in chests so monkeys can't steal 'em!
Strong tribe always need capable spear sharpener. Pointy sticks keep angry animals away!
Huts are good for rains, keep tribe dry! Build huts for now, but soon you move on!
Got special job now, heal hearts for weary tribelings! Sound hard? Blast balls to move up!
Monkeys and lemurs try to take treasures! Don't let them! Tribe needs treasures for big reasons!
Sometime tribe's hearts get run down. Fix them with love and attention! Then blast balls!
Oof! Great job to do, smack orbs all day! Teach those orbs lessons, then eat fruit to relax!
Who likes dirty Temple? Nobody! Big honor to scrub Temple night and noon!
Bamboo grows big, tribe needs tireless hacker to chop paths! Find good ones and blast balls!
Ah! Tribe just got Slice-o-mat 5000! Use it to dice Fruit into attractive and tasty deli plates!
Hey! More hearts are good for whole tribe! Find lots and keep some for yourself!
Boom! Tribe discover gunpowder! Makes huge bang and scares monkeys. Pack it tight and good!
Tribe is full of Mojo. Someone must mong it! Mong the Mojo to customers for better Mojo all round!
So many Kudos! Tribe needs place to display 'em all. Maybe a nice cabinet?
Sometimes hearts get dirty. Wipe them clean for tribe and earn much praise!
Ha ha ha! You getting really good now! Smash spheres like crazy with all your powers!
You find lots of hearts, good for you! Make big collection and show off to friends!
Nobody can take kudos away , but we like you. Make you Kudo Guard out of respect!
You Heart Doctor now! Like witch doctor, but without crazy shrinking heads!
Whomp! You bash spheres all day and late into the night! How you so good already?
Tribe enjoys kudos and wants to keep them defended. Great new job, slight pay raise!
We all like Mojo but tribe recognizes you like it really lots! Get new title to show approval!
Kablam! Evil spheres kept in check by righteous action! Such amazing power on you!
Hearts are under attack! Sadness and monkeys lambaste the hearts! Protect them quick!
Your knowledge of treasure in many forms amazes tribe! They give you new rank and a coconut too!
Not many folks in tribe got heart like you. That's why you're Heart Champion now!
It takes brave hero to smush so many spheres! Maybe a new Power could help too!
Hooray! You save many hearts, tribe make statue of you and take Monday off in your honor!
Smacking orbs not enough! Must be eliminated complete! You best for job, so do it!
So many Fruit flavors! Can you combine them for tasty juices and salads? Try! Your job now!
Too many spheres! Need big Sphere Blaster to remove them. Lucky we have you!
Tribe got lots of legends. Now we got one more. It's you! Surprise! No? Who told?
You got lots of Mojo expertise, so Mojo Maven is appropriate rank now! More Mojo!
Big balls not so tough! When Ball Cracker is on the job, balls get cracked right!
Yikes! Hailstorm threatens our kudos! Need strong courageous hero to protect. Know just who!
Your heart so strong and pure, we make up whole new rank to describe you!
Teach balls a lesson with good smacking! Maybe balls think twice before causing trouble!
Defend the Fruit! Hungry animals want it! Tribe must fight fiercely! Poke with sharpened spear!
Zap! Change things up a bit, zap balls now instead of smack them! Fun to try new things!
Big promotion to Heart Chief! We give you few moments to reflect on accomplishments.
You decimate orbs, reduce number by one tenth! Or hey, even more if you want!
Mojo is tricky stuff. Mojo Master is huge achievement! Put on party and wear Mojo hat!
WABOOM! Yow! Big explosion clears out balls and leaves everybody with ears ringing!
Kudos have many spooky magic thingies! Smart Kudo Shaman controls kudo energy right now!
Lemurs tried to steal treasure last night. Tribe needs guard! Beat lemurs with a stick!
Pop! Balls burst like big balloons when you're around! Burst more with great powers!
Nobody does Fruit like you! You big Fruit Champion, fruit come from miles around to say "LOVE YOU!"
We hate orbs and balls so much! We name you Orb Annihilator. Job comes with fancy office!
Crash! That's the sound of balls being crashed by YOU! Great new job! Crash more balls!
Expunge all the orbs! Scrub mentions from magazine articles. Whatever it takes!
Tribe got together. We make you Kudo Master! Last Kudo Master quit, so job all yours now.
You already crash balls, why not smash them too! Better rank with more privileges!
Mmmmm! Fruit Smoothie so filling and delicious. Healthy too! Why you so great tasty, huh?
Oooooh! Orbs make tribe so mad! Use special powers and good humor to eradicate!
Diligent Frog! Balls get so bashed by you! Bash more balls and fruit too!
Hey! Demolish orbs, make way for new orbs! Never-ending cycle goes on and on!
Sacred smoke! You're so good with kudos we just have to call you "Kudo Champion" now!
Whole tribe goes quiet when you talk fruit. Many fruit mysteries, all known by you!
No balls can escape! Protect tribe by hunting balls, destroy them by matching! You know!
Whoa! Eat orbs? This is strange new approach. But hey, whatever works!
Lifting gold all day makes you strong! Strong enough to be great Treasure Champion!
Tribe hereby decree NO MORE BALLS. Up to you to carry out mission. Good luck!
It's time to clobber! Clobber what you know best: BALLS! Leave none unclobbered!
Remember when you were Kudo Champion? Now you're Kudo Legend. Things change quick!
You are Fruit Veteran. Easy to get blase and feel like you've seen all fruit. But always new ones!
When balls break, points spill out all over! Not good for balls but you get tasty points!
All these rotten orbs! Slam them into dust and do orb-slamming dance for tribe!
So many verbs to destroy balls! Many of them rhyme, too. What rhymes with "Blaster"?
Kudo Chief gets to boss around all the Kudo Champions. Glad that's you now, huh?
Hah! You are Master of Balls. Tribe knew it! You deserve best rank ever!
You big on kudos since the beginning. Only natural to call you Kudo Veteran now!
Zow-wow! Tribe almost have to invent new words to capture your awesome! Bravo you!
Almost impossible to get to this rank! Only best or most amazing people ever do!

unlocks_dialog.max_next: Golden Frog grants a 10% increase in shot speed!

potion_giveaway.body: Lucky Frog! Mojo flows abundant! Earn TRIPLE Mojo for every game.

level.body: Puny Frog! I grant you Balls of Time. Blast them to get five extra seconds!
Hot Frog alights from the heavens. Shoot quickly to summon three mortifying Fireballs!
Worthy Frog! You call forth Spirit Animals to celebrate your score. Play plenty to hoard them all!
The Temple hungers for Mojo. Feed it and it will reward you with strong Powers! And speaking of Powers, now you'll get to use Bombs!
Sweet, tasty fruit! Shoot them with balls to earn big points! Score value grows with each Fruit collected!
Last Hurrah Power makes special balls explode for points after the game! Your end is mighty!
Shoot Chests to collect them during play! Afterwards open for sweet prizes!
Another Power slot is yours to use! Powers grow for fatter points!
Ball speed is all. Use Speed Ball Power to shoot faster and speed your balls!
For mysterious reasons I grant you one more heart. Ball-blasting is now extended!
Fortune grins at you. Your treasure chests have an extra slot for victory!
Hearts are for life. Now your hearts come back faster for more crushing!
Kabloom! You got a small chance for double points on each shot now!
Arg! Your ball-blasting is huge! All three Power slots can now be used by you!
Fractious Frog! I grant you the Cannon of Balls. Use fire and iron to blast in 3 directions!
Fruit-gulping Frog! I grant your fruit more sweetness. Blast them for even more points!
Fungible Frog! Here is another heart of life. Use it fiercely!
Volcanic power! Inferno Frog Power gives Hot Frog four blasts instead of three!
Mojo completes you. Now you earn 50% more Mojo for every blasted ball!
You have released Spirit Animal Eagle. Now scores of 1.1 Million are recognized by Spirits!
Undying Frog! Now your hearts come back even faster than before!
Tasting Frog! I grant Fruit Master Power. Fruit pops more often now, yes!
I feel generous today. Here. Take this extra heart for more living force!
See the noble Spirit Animal Alligator! Score over 1.2 Million to make him happy!
Faster! Even faster now do your hearts come back!
Explosive Frog! I grant Chain Blast Power. Chain together shots and soon see big explosions!
Spirit Animal Shark guides you and inspires you. Swim past 1.3 Million to earn his respect!
Prodigious Frog! Now balls give double normal Mojo. Load up on Mojo big-time!
More time is needed! Chrono Ball Power makes Time Balls better, adds +1 second to each!
You use your heart strongly! Now hearts come back faster than ever!
Lucky Frog! Now your treasure chests have more potential for reward!
Another heart. Here, take it. It is awesome to add more living!
Foom! Power gives you x2 starting multiplier! Points get bigger faster sooner, yes!
Heartfelt Frog! Your hearts go by too quickly. Now they come back sooner!
Skpow! Critical Hit is slightly more likely to double points!
I see you like the Fruit. Let the Fruit be tastier still, with more points!
You need more power. This Tiki Bomb Power will give you it with Tiki style!
Hmmm... Power, Power... how about faster heart regeneration? Yes!
Your efforts are major. Now you earn even more Mojo for every game!
You please me, Frog. This Mega Hurrah kicks the balls of the old Last Hurrah!
Long time since new Spirit Animal! Hope you not score over 1.4 Million before now!
Life is for living. Live faster and better by getting hearts back quicker!
Long ago we spoke of Speed Ball. Now taste the glory of Super Speed Ball!
Your Fruit has changed from what it was. It is now better and sweeter!
Strength from behind. This new Cannon King Power explodes greatly!
You are strong and know the drill. Faster heart regeneration is yours!
Likely Frog! I grant a slight betterment of your Critical Hit percentage!
You crush balls mightily! Now your crushing earns triple the normal Mojo!
The moon hides his face. Sun Frog Power told him to get lost and he did!
Behold wondrous new Spirit Animal Jaguar! Don't feel bad, Spirit Animal Elephant. You are still great too.
Your chest gets luckier still. Only one spot remains locked!
The wild sings out. It brings juicy Fruit forward oftener to amaze!
Why eat old Fruit when new Fruit are available? I grant you new fruitful Fruit!
Laborious Frog! Your Hits of Critical just got a bit more likely!
Your old Chain Blast was mighty, Frog. But not as mighty as Super Chain!
Lightning cracks! Thunder roars! Your Critical Hit percentage just went up!
Another Spirit Animal rises and takes his place. Love him as he loves you.
Hear the drums. The Voodoo Bomb Power is their curse and your delight!
Fruit grows tastier and riper. It makes your mouth happier to eat!
Splendid Frog! You deserve more Critical Hitting. You will have it!
Do you believe Fruit can appear so many times? Epic Fruit makes it happen!
Do not consider Critical Hit upgrades as filler. They are so much more!
Bouncy Frog! Meet Spirit Animal Lion. Is she not totally great?
The voice of the Fruit is juicy. More juice is yours, and more juiciness also!
Temporal Frog! Time is your thing. Tempus Fugit Power extends time! Try it!
Perhaps your taste for Critical Hits has slackened. This upgrade will change that forever!
See, Risky Frog! See how your Treasure Chest is full of tasty surprise!
Kraka-BOOM! Old Cannon King Power is made totally lame by new Super Cannon!
Boom! Zaka-zaka! More Critical Hit likelihood! How are those apples, Frog?
Brag, O Boastful Frog. Brag of your new and oh-so-shiny Spirit Animal Dinosaur!
Slurp! Has a Frog ever feasted on Fruit as great as this new one? Unlikely!
Cram! The gods shatter! The Warp Ball Power blinds goats and shocks everyone!
Rowdy Frog! Earn more points more quickly with saucy new Critical Hits!
You fight hard, Fierce Frog. Have a Mega Chain Power! Seriously, it is on me.
Ha! Now Spirit Animal Unicorn takes his place by your side. Revere him!
Time is a relative dimension in space. The Timelord Power is absolute!
Collecting Frog! See your final Spirit Animal. It pleases me that you have the full set.
Crush all balls! Use this Multi-Multiplier Power for points unthinkable!
Aurous Frog! Now you are great and Golden! Forever now your shots are 10% faster!

highscore_dialog.bosshead: You have fought well, mighty frog. Here is proof of your greatness!

life.dialogStart: The Coin has failed you. This once I will save you! Here are $num Idols just to buy a Full Life Refill right now.
life.dialogEnd: Your Life has been restored! I'll see you next time you run out of Life. Trust me; it will happen.
life.infoStore: Buy Life from the Store. Click to go there.
life.infoItem: This will fill up all $num of your Hearts. Click it now to buy it.
life.infoTab: Click the Life tab to buy more Life.

temple.dialogStart: Congratulations! You have unlocked the Temple. Your first Power is Bombs! Follow the arrows to use it in your next game.
temple.dialogEnd: Bombs cost Mojo every game they are used. Disable Bombs at any time by selecting them in the Temple. Enjoy your new Power!
temple.infoClose: Click to close the Temple and play your next game.
temple.infoItem: Click to use Bombs in your next game.

templeSecond.dialogStart: You just unlocked the Last Hurrah Power!
templeSecond.dialogEnd:
Change which Powers to
play with by clicking on them.
templeSecond.infoFirepit: First, remove your active Power by clicking on it.
templeSecond.infoItem: Click to activate the Last Hurrah Power.
templeSecond.infoOpen: Click here to open your temple of Powers.
templeSecond.infoClose: Click Close to play your next game with Last Hurrah.

mojo.dialogStart: Stock up on Mojo to use Powers. Follow the arrows to buy some now.
mojo.dialogEnd: Congrats! You have enough Mojo to use your Powers!
mojo.infoStore: Buy Mojo from the Store. Click to go there.
mojo.infoItem: This will give you $num Mojo. Click it now to buy it.

potionXp.dialogStart:
Want more XP? Zuma give more! Here are $num Idols just to buy a
Double XP Potion right now!
potionXp.dialogEnd:
Your new XP Potion lasts 24 hours! Play lots Zuma!
HUA!
potionXp.infoStore:
Buy Potions from the Store.
Click to go there.
potionXp.infoItem: This Potion earns you DOUBLE the XP for 24 hours.
potionXp.infoTab: Click the Potions tab to buy a Potion.
potionXp.infoPotions:
Here are your active Potions.
Click to continue.

drmojo.title: Out of Mojo!
drmojo.info:
Me Dr. Mojo. Me see you out of Mojo. You no can use Powers.
Is ok. Me here to help!
drmojo.walkthrough: Me give you extra Idols this time just to buy Mojo right now.

first.body:
You earned your first Spirit [ANIMAL] token!

Show your Zuma Blitz friends that [ANIMAL] has your back.

week.header: You earned a Spirit Animal Token!
week.body:
Your score earned another [ANIMAL] token!

Share proof of your greatness with friends that play Zuma Blitz.

spirit_animal_rankup_dialog.body: Your score earned your Spirt Animal

quote.rank: Dash of the Beetle! Strike of the Beetle! Bite of the Beetle!
The wisdom of the beetle is known to the ant but lost to the lion.
The beetle does not move. But look away for a moment and see! The beetle is gone.
The elder beetle has been around the block not once, twice or thrice, but... what's the word for four times?
The master beetle knows his moment. He has lived it a thousand times before it arrives.
The avatar beetle shows his colors, but only at night.
Squeak of the Rat! Spirit of the Rat! Sneak of the Rat!
The wisdom of the rat is not loud. But when all other beasts are gone, only the rat remains.
The rat bides his time, for he knows the lion cannot eat all its kill.
Canny is the elder rat, attuned to his surroundings, wary of one-time offers and big front-end discounts.
Be mindful of the master rat. When he vanishes, wise animals do the same.
An old rat is a brave rat.
Skin of the Lizard!
The lizard knows his way. It's the raccoon's way that messes him up.
When the lizard looks into the abyss, the abyss looks back and says, "Whoa, a lizard."
Elder lizard feels good about where he's at in life, but he knows there's room for improvement.
When the master lizard loses a leg, he grows it back. Then he finds the old leg behind the couch.
The skin of the avatar lizard turns to gold, so he must be doing something right.
Tooth of the Weasel!
The weasel knows the truth. Trouble is, it's a weasel truth.
The weasel knows when to hold 'em, and also when to fold 'em. It's walking away he has problems with.
The weasel elder is sneaky, but he's sneaky enough to know how not to LOOK sneaky, if you know what I mean.
The weasel master hunts only at night. But in the day, he hunts for bargains.
The avatar weasel watches you, measures you, tests you. He wants to know if you can spare a couple bucks.
Fang of the Snake!
The fang of the snake is sharp, but also laced with poison. It's a pretty good fang, considering.
The eye of the snake is unblinking. His gaze is fixed. But his mind is on faraway donuts.
Elder snake looks back at a long life and thinks, "Man, I sure did leave a lot of shedded skin all over the place."
The scale of the snake sparkles at noon. But when two o'clock rolls around, sparkle time is over.
Many are the mysteries of the avatar snake. They start with his Italian sandal collection and just get weirder.
Horn of the Cow!
The cow is wise, but not too wise, for in this she likes to keep people guessing.
When the cow closes her eyes, know then that the party is truly over.
The cow takes its time, measures its pace, and prepares for bed with a cool glass of grape-apple fruit juice.
The persistence of the cow is her power. She knows the cud will get tasty after enough chews.
When the cow plants her hoof, she will not be moved. When she lifts her hoof, that's when you tip her over.
Claw of the Cat! Meow of the Cat!
If you wonder at the way of the cat, you have yet to check your slippers.
The cat can meow all it wants but he's been outside already this evening.
The elder cat knows peace, for it worked out a sweet deal long ago and isn't budging for anything.
The purr of the master cat soothes the heart of the most rageful beasts, except for alligators.
When the avatar cat fixes her unblinking gaze on something, that means she's asleep.
Baaa of the Sheep!
The shepherd tends the herd, but the sheep do all the high-level management.
Soft is the wool of the sheep, but scratchy are her hooves.
Irascible is the mood of the elder sheep, at least until somebody explains what "irascible" means.
The sheep says "baaaa," but only because she's stalling for time.
The glory of the avatar sheep cannot be matched by gold, gems or federal bonds.
Shell of the Turtle!
The wise turtle relies for safety not on his shell but on his diversified portfolio.
The turtle may be slow, but he makes up for it by kicking the rabbit in the kneecaps.
The elder turtle makes the elder everybody else look like they just knocked out their first tooth at kindergarten.
It is easy to underestimate the master turtle on land, but in the sea, whoa, watch out.
Many have mistaken the avatar turtle for a shiny candy, and they have paid for their mistake.
Foot of the Rabbit!
Fleet of foot is the rabbit, and quicker even on the draw.
Wise is he who knows not to get between the rabbit and a pound of gold-plated carrots.
The elder rabbit may not be as fast as he used to be, but he makes up for it with style and a lot of money.
The master rabbit chews slowly, for he knows that's where the real flavor is.
Praise the avatar rabbit, luckiest of beasts, for he draws to an inside straight every time.
Grin of the Jackal!
The jackal laughs, and in his laugh know that he's figured out your little game.
The jackal is the cleverest of beasts, but don't ask him to install your printer.
Elder jackal knows where the good stuff is. Quick tip: it's just inside the haunch.
The master jackal coats himself in bling not for pride, but just so he knows where it all is.
In the eye of the avatar jackal wink the secrets of the world and the hot hot deal.
Horn of the Goat!
See the goat's leap, and know that his lottery numbers totally worked out.
The goat backs down from neither the lion nor the hound, though he's a bit twitchy around the beetle.
Elder goat has in his time consumed wood, tin cans, old shoes, remote controls... he is not picky.
The beard of the goat has the look of scruff, but he spends a lot of time getting it just right.
Headbutt not the avatar goat because, face it buddy, you're gonna lose that one.
Shoulder of the Ox!
Confuse not the ox with the yak, for the yak is a completely different animal.
Strong is the ox, strong yet sensitive, for he will cry at the flicks of chicks.
Elder ox looks over his shoulder, sees the yoke and thinks, "Truly, is it not yet Friday?"
Sturdy is the industrious master ox, toiling in the field for compliments.
When the ox puts down his yoke for the day, another he picks up for the night.
Gill of the Fish!
Pointy are the teeth of the fish, but not so pointy as its sarcasm.
Oceans deep lives the fish, though it likes to summer in Morocco.
The longer the elder fish lives, the deeper it swims and the more interested it becomes in new medical technology.
The wisdom of the fish is cold and clammy and goes well with a Caesar salad.
The avatar fish leaps from the waters to grant wishes and high-fives all around.
Bark of the Hound!
The loyalty of the hound speaks louder than any sound, though the barking can be pretty damn loud.
The hound fetches not for his master but for himself and his reputation.
The elder hound not only learns new tricks but carries a full course load at the local community college.
Know that as the tail of the master hound wags, so too does his heart.
Who's a good avatar hound? Is it you? Is it? It IS you! Good boy!
Beak of the Toucan!
Adapted is the beak of the toucan for the gobbling of fruit and the cracking of nuts.
The wisdom of the toucan commands respect, but he prefers to downplay this aspect of his personality.
One day the elder toucan discovered it no longer liked coconuts. That was a rough day for the elder toucan.
Mistake not the toucan for the puffin, though the puffin will be pumped if you do.
The caw of the toucan rouses the spirit and lightens the heart, though only those of other toucans.
Eye of the Lemur!
The lemur watches all, sees all, hears all, smells all, and posts all to his blog.
When the lemur calls out, know that you are seconds from being totally surrounded by lemurs.
The elder lemur never takes its opposable thumbs for granted, for in the animal kingdom such thumbs are quite the deal.
The master lemur is wise and knows all, but he likes to keep that little fact to himself.
The lemur marks his territory with care, distinction and... well, let's just leave it at care and distinction.
Wing of the Eagle!
None escape the eye of the eagle, nor evade his story about how one time he found fifty bucks in a tree.
The eagle soars high above wind and cloud, but even he must come to earth to do his laundry.
The elder eagle is always on lookout, seeking secret knowledge and new ways to pick bits of bad squirrel out of his beak.
The master eagle strikes terror in the heart of the mouse, even when he's just asking for directions.
Of all living things, none sees farther than the avatar eagle except maybe a tapir with a radio telescope.
Jaw of the Gator!
The gnash of the alligator is much feared, but few realize it's all an act.
Mention neither wrestling nor boots to the alligator, for on these subjects he is touchy.
Many are the skills of the elder alligator. He is the absolute king, for example, of looking like a log.
The master alligator worked hard to get where he is, and darn it he is not going to apologize.
The bite of the avatar alligator is devastating, but that is just his way of saying, "Hi, I'd like to eat you."
Fin of the Shark!
The shark never stops moving, though he frequently stops thinking.
The shark looks around, wonders why he has no friends, and then realizes, "Oh, right. I'm a shark."
The elder shark has been swimming for his whole life and sees no reason to change at this point in the game.
It is unwise to challenge the shark in his waters, unless you are talking backgammon.
The avatar shark never gets to show off, but when this starts to bother him, he gargles some krill and forgets about it.
Nose of the Elephant!
Earth shakes and dust rises on the approach of the elephant, but he'd prefer if you didn't say anything.
The memory of the elephant is well known, even as his skill at symbolic logic gets completely ignored.
Over the years of life and memory, the elder elephant candidly admits he's actually forgotten quite a lot of stuff.
Long is the life of the elephant and much has he seen, but he's never seen anything like that score you just posted!
When the elephant departed this world, he left the avatar elephant behind to remind people how amazing elephants are.
Tooth of the Jaguar!
Ferocious is the face of the jaguar, like seriously we're not kidding, look at him, he'll take your scalp off.
Attend to the howl of the jaguar, because if you don't things are not gonna go well for you.
Speak slowly to the elder jaguar, not because he can't follow you but because it gives him time to think.
When you reach the level of master jaguar, know that you have made it and you are cool.
There is no fear in the heart of the avatar jaguar, only a calm detached feeling of supreme awesome.
Paw of the Bear!
The shaman bear emerges from his cave, sees his shadow and goes about his routine.
The chief bear is generally omnivorous, but he's got a particular weakness for foie gras.
He's seen it countless times, but the arrival of spring each year always hits the elder bear as a total shock.
When you get 1.6 Million points the master bear roars and prances about and generally kicks up a huge fuss.
Avatar bear is bear of all bears, lean and hungry and confident in his sweet Zuma skills.
Roar of the Lion!
Hush my darling, don't cry my darling, the shaman lion is busy with his crossword tonight.
The chief lion is chief of the king of the jungle. In truth this confuses him as much as anybody.
Elder lion looks around, sees that nobody is watching, and then smells his feet.
Master lion flops back on the savanna, torpid and satisfied with the huge Zuma score you got.
Avatar lion got 1.7 million points at Zuma once. Yep, that was a pretty awesome day.
Age of the Dinosaur!
The shaman dinosaur grins his toothy grin and thinks about eating a squad of mammals for lunch.
When the dinosaur speaks, all listen. But he never does, so most people don't know that about him.
Elder dinosaur sometimes wonders about all these upstart lemurs but figures it doesn't really concern him.
Long has the master dinosaur hidden from the eyes of the world, but he's coming back, count on it.
Avatar dinosaur just signed a three-book deal and a movie option, so he's feeling pretty good.
Secret of the Unicorn!
Every day the unicorn eats a basket of rainbows with a pinch of fairy dust for fibre.
The chief unicorn puts in 110 percent effort and gets good results pretty much every time.
Time means nothing to the unicorn, but that doesn't mean he's not gonna remind you every chance he gets.
The master unicorn builds his Zuma skills by going all out on every ball game he can find.
Avatar unicorn is so full of magic sometimes he sweats it out, but it's a good sweat.
Feather of the Quetzalcoatl!
When the Quetzalcoatl wings his enormous self over the skyline, it's best to duck. Trust me on this.
Chief Quetzalcoatl accepts offerings, prayers, benedictions and certified money orders.
Many aeons have passed for the elder Quetzalcoatl, so many he even sometimes forgets his birthday until the week after.
Though the edicts of the master Quetzalcoatl may seem harsh, they're only designed to toughen you up.
Snaking from realms of mist and mystery, the avatar Quetzalcoatl is actually a pretty regular dude.

powerup.name: Bombs
powerup.tooltip: Bomb balls added to rollout. Explode when matched!

powerup.name: Multiplier
powerup.tooltip: Starts your game with a x2 Multiplier.

powerup.name: Last Hurrah
powerup.tooltip: Explodes special balls at the end of a game for extra points.
powerup.tooltip_alt:
Explodes at the end of a game for extra points
[COST] Mojo/game

powerup.name: Chrono Balls
powerup.tooltip:
Adds 1 second to Time Balls
(for a total of 6 seconds).

powerup.name: Cannon
powerup.tooltip: Cannon balls added to rollout. Match for triple shot!

powerup.name: Chain Blast
powerup.tooltip: Causes an explosion to occur for a x10 chain.

powerup.name: Speed Shot
powerup.tooltip: Increases how fast your frog shoots by 10%.

powerup.name: Inferno Frog
powerup.tooltip:
Gives Hot Frog 1 extra fireball shot
(for a total of 4 shots).
powerup.tooltip_alt:
+1 fireball shot added to Hot Frog
[COST] Mojo/game

powerup.name: Fruit Master
powerup.tooltip: Increases how often Fruit appears!

powerup.name: Tiki Bombs
powerup.tooltip: Makes Bombs show up quicker on rollout.

powerup.name: Tempus Fugit
powerup.tooltip:
Adds 2 seconds to Time Balls
(for a total of 7 seconds).

powerup.name: Mega Hurrah
powerup.tooltip: Explodes special balls at the end of a game for DOUBLE the points of Last Hurrah.
powerup.tooltip_alt:
Doubles point bonus for Last Hurrah
[COST] Mojo/game

powerup.name: Multi-Multiplier
powerup.tooltip: Starts your game with a x3 Multiplier.

powerup.name: Cannon King
powerup.tooltip: Increases the frequency Cannon Balls come out in the rollout.

powerup.name: Super Chain
powerup.tooltip: Causes an explosion to occur for a x9 chain.

powerup.name: Super Speed
powerup.tooltip: Increases how fast your frog shoots by 20%.

powerup.name: Sun Frog
powerup.tooltip:
Gives Hot Frog 2 extra fireball shots
(for a total of 5 shots).
powerup.tooltip_alt:
+2 fireball shots added to Hot Frog
[COST] Mojo/game

powerup.name: Juicy Fruit
powerup.tooltip: Increases how often Fruit appears!
powerup.tooltip_alt:
Fruit appears a lot more often.
[COST] Mojo/game

powerup.name: Voodoo Bombs
powerup.tooltip: Increases the blast radius for Bomb balls.

powerup.name: Timelord
powerup.tooltip:
Adds 3 seconds to Time Balls
(for a total of 8 seconds).

powerup.name: Super Cannon
powerup.tooltip:
Adds an additional shot to the Cannon
(for a total of 4 shots).
powerup.tooltip_alt:
Super Cannon Ball added to rollout
[COST] Mojo/game

powerup.name: Mega Chain
powerup.tooltip: Increases the size of the explosion for a x9 chain.
powerup.tooltip_alt:
Increased explosion for a x9 chain
[COST] Mojo/game

powerup.name: Epic Fruit
powerup.tooltip: Increases how often Fruit appears!
powerup.tooltip_alt:
Fruit appears around twice as often.
[COST] Mojo/game

powerup.name: Warp Speed
powerup.tooltip: Increases how fast your frog shoots by 30%.

tooltips.label: Use Idols to purchase special game items!
tooltips.add_idols: Purchase more Idols with Facebook Credits!

descriptions.desc: Mojo lets you use Powers in your games.
Potions let you earn Mojo or XP faster.
Powers add special balls and bonuses to your game.
Power Slots let you use more powers in your game.
Unlock a chance for even more treasure.
Mojo lets you use powers in your games.

purchase_dialog.no_idols:
Not enough Idols.
Would you like to use
Facebook Credits?

achievement_stats.locked:
Who waits in shadows? Spirits? Animals? Or maybe...
SPIRIT ANIMALS!
Unlocks at Level 4

messages.message: You are crafty like lemur, trying to claim your own gift. We like your moxie. Alas, the spirits will only grant this to your friends.
You've already claimed the Zuma Blitz gift from this post.
The Zuma Blitz gift from this post have already been claimed.
You are not eligible to collect this Zuma Blitz gift.
You are not eligible to collect this Zuma Blitz gift.
You have moxie, frog, but this Mojo gift is for friends only. Play now to earn your own!
Uh oh, the Zuma Gods don’t quite understand what you’re trying for. Please try clicking on that link again.
The Zuma Gods don’t know what you’re trying to do, something about one to many “oogas” per “booga”… Please try clicking on that link again.
The Zuma Gods have consulted with one another and determined that this offer has expired. Frogs must be both wise and speedy to claim such gifts.
Clever monkey, you have already claimed that gift. The Zuma Gods like your moxie, but only one gift for you!
